data.message: Em, if you wanna raise more money for charity why not make more than 10?? I bet there's 1,000,000 fans out there willing to pay a high price for these. Me included.. But unfortunately for me, I'm one of your "working class" (poorer) fans who can't affords to bid with against the a rich fans for these...

replies.message: Exactly :).. I'm still saving up for the Eminem G-shock watch atm.. There's no change I can afford to outbid the richer fans who only listen to him coz they like Not Afraid 😂
